---
title: subset_h5mu
---

Create a subset of a mudata file by selecting the first number of observations


## Argument help

Run the following command to view the module's help page:
```bash
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline -r main_build -main-script target/nextflow/filter/subset_h5mu/main.nf --help
```

### Arguments



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name                       |Description                                               |Attributes                            |
|:--------------------------|:---------------------------------------------------------|:-------------------------------------|
|`--input`                  |Input h5mu file                                           |file, required, example: "input.h5mu" |
|`--output`                 |Output h5mu file.                                         |file, example: "output.h5mu"          |
|`--number_of_observations` |Number of observations to be selected from the h5mu file. |integer, example: 5                   |
:::
